nodes.text: The Brentaal League was an ancient organization which governed the colonization of numerous planets in the years leading up to the Great Sith War.

The League had extended its hyperlane network to the Expansion Region by 4020 BBY. They established the first Human settlement on Muzara circa 4000 BBY, with the intent of starting a lucrative farm industry. In the process they sparked a diplomatic war with the native Muza. The League's sphere of influence began to wane soon thereafter.
